synopsis.text: Four years after the war between the Ninku ninja clan and the Imperial Army, the three surviving Ninku members Fuusuke, Touji, and Aichou journey to Sky Plains Village to deliver a knife to Makoto. This knife belonged to Makoto's late brother Eiji, who was their fallen comrade. When the Ninku trio arrives at the village, they find it seemingly abandoned and the remaining villagers hiding in fear. They enter a restaurant where they meet Makoto, disguised as a boy, and her friend Sakichi. It is revealed that Sky Plains Village has been invaded by the Rasenryu pirate gang, who have been terrorizing and kidnapping the locals. With the villagers in danger, the Ninku ninja must fight to defeat the ruthless Rasenryu pirates and liberate Sky Plains Village. This OVA tells the story of the Ninku using their skills to battle threats in a town that needs their protection.
